alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 1:14PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, with locally higher amounts of 6 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Jackson Hole and Star Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. The heaviest amounts of snow will occur through the overnight hours tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility in open areas north of Jackson. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
